inventory.name: Inventory
inventory.hint: Offers the ability to toggle between the regular and an alternate version of the character sheet's `Inventory` tab at any moment by clicking once more on the tab icon.

nobulk.name: No Dropped Bulk
nobulk.hint: (Requires Reload) Dropped equipment in an actor's inventory won't be accounted for bulk value calculation.

nobulk-coins.name: Weightless Coins
nobulk-coins.hint: (Requires Reload) Coins are weightless when enabled.

auto-runes.name: Automatic Rune Progression
auto-runes.hint: (Requires Reload) Meant to be used in stead of the ABP variant rule to automatically give potency/striking/resilient runes to equipment. 'Force Update' will always update the runes based on actor level while 'Keep Highest' will update the runes only if they are currently lower than what they should be at that level.

unided.name: Set Un-Identified Image
unided.hint: Automatically set the un-identifed image of items to be the same as the regular image.

knowledges.name: Npc Lore Knowledges
knowledges.hint: Adds the option to set custom lores for NPCs.

effect-remove.name: Remove Effect Shortcut
effect-remove.hint: Using [Shift + Right Click] on effect icons in the effects panel will instantly remove all its charges/counters/badges.

condition-sheet.name: Condition Sheet Icon
condition-sheet.hint: Adds a new icon to condition in the effects panel to open their sheet just like you would with non-condition effects.

multi-cast.name: Multi-Cast
multi-cast.hint: A new 'Multi' button will appear next to spells `Damage` button allowing the cast of multiple instances of the spell at once, Changing this setting will only update the last 10 messages in chat.

merge-damage.name: Merge Damage
merge-damage.hint: A new small icon is added to damage roll messages allow them to be merged with another damage roll message of the same type preceding it.

summary.name: Spells Summary
summary.hint: Offers the ability to toggle between the regular and an alternate version of the character sheet's `Spellcasting` tab at any moment by clicking once more on the tab icon.

giveth.name: Giveth
giveth.hint: Allow players to give items to other player-owned actors. They can also add conditions and effect to other player-owned actors if it originated from them.

stances.name: Stances
stances.hint: Add stances buttons in the character sheet to toggle them faster, it will also remove stances at the end of the encounter and more.

custom-stances.name: Custom Stances
custom-stances.hint: Comma separated list of compendium pack id containing custom stance feats/features, can also list directly world feats/features uuid ; Custom feats/features must have the 'stance' trait and have a self-applied effect.

hero.name: Hero Actions
hero.hint: Adds a section in the PF2e character sheet to manage the 'Hero Point Deck' actions alternate rule.

hero-table.name: Hero Actions - Table UUID
hero-table.hint: Unique ID of the Deck Table. To get the UUID of a table (in a compendium or in the Rollable Tables directory), simply open the table and Right-Click on ðŸ“” next to its name. If left empty, the first Hero Deck table found in your world will be used, if none, then the default compendium table will be used instead.

hero-trade.name: Hero Actions - Allow Trade
hero-trade.hint: When enabled, players will be able to trade action with each others.

hero-private.name: Hero Actions - Private Draw
hero-private.hint: When enabled, the message generated when drawing hero actions will be private instead of public.

modifiers.name: Hide Modifiers
modifiers.hint: Messages generated by non-player owned actors will see their modifiers tags hidden from players. Can also hide traits tags.

share.name: Share Health Pool
share.hint: Allow 2 actors to share their HP and SP in a "master" and "slave" relationship. The option to select a "master" can be found in the `Configure` menu of a creature sheet. The `Force Refresh` should only be used if you notice some modules getting out of sync with the "slave" creatures.

target.name: Target Token Helper
target.hint: Allow the use of Target Token Helper in your world, its different parts are client side settings and can be found below.

target-client.name: Target Token Helper - Chat
target-client.hint: Damage chat messages will have extra application damage rows for each owned token that was targeted during the roll.

target-template.name: Target Token Helper - Template
target-template.hint: When placing a template on the board, a new dialog will pop allowing you to target all the tokens inside the template (with various criterias).

force-untarget.name: Force Un-Target
force-untarget.hint: Will forcibly remove the targets of all users at turn/round change. The 'Un-Target' client setting is overriden if this one is enabled.

untarget.name: Un-Target
untarget.hint: Will remove all your targets at turn/round change. This is overiden by the 'Force Un-Target' world setting.

pf2e-toolbelt.module-conflict: The module {name} is not needed while using PF2e Toolbelt, you can disable it safely

arp.forceVariant: The module PF2e Toolbelt disabled the pf2e system variant ABP rule to work properly

editLore.title: {name} - Edit Lores
editLore.hint: Enter comma separated lores which will replace the generic ones in the sheet

multi.title: {name} - Multi Cast
multi.hint: Number of instances to be cast at once
multi.zero: You cannot cast 0 instance of a spell.

damage.none: No other damage message of this type was found

notification.zero: You cannot give an item you don't have yourself.

stances.noCombat: You can enter or be in a stance only in encounter mode

master.label: Share HP
master.hint: When selecting a master, this actor will share the other character's HP (and stamina).

use.noPoints: You need at least 1 Hero Point to use a Hero Action.
use.noDetails: Could not find the details for this Hero Action.

trade-request.title: Trade Request
trade-request.header: The character {sender} wants to trade with {receiver}
trade-request.accept: Would you like to accept the deal?

actions-use.header: Spends a Hero Point to use

hero.trade-rejected: Your trade for Hero Action has been rejected by {name}.
hero.trade-error: An error occured during the Hero Action trade.
hero.no-points: You need to discard ({nb}) Hero Action before you can engage in a trade.
hero.no-action: You don't have any Hero Action to trade.

trade.title: Trade Hero Action
trade.select: Select the character to trade with
trade.no-select: Please select one Hero Action to give and one to receive.
trade.no-user: The target has no owner or their are not online.
trade.error: An error occured during the trade. Most likely a Hero Action was missing.

confirm.title: Default Table Confirm?
confirm.content: A default table already exists in this world, would you like to override it or create a new one ?

removeActions.title: Remove Hero Actions from Characters
removeActions.removed: Hero Actions were removed on selected Character(s).

giveAction.noCharacter: You must provide a character that will receive the Hero Action
giveAction.title: Give Hero Action to Character

table.name: Hero Actions Deck (do not delete)
table.description: Table for Hero Actions used in consort with the Hero Points.
table.noFormula: The Hero Deck table has no formula, tell your GM he messed up.
table.noFormulaCompendium: The Hero Deck table has no formula and is a compendium table.
table.drawError: An error occurred during the draw, most likely the table contains non-conform results.

hero.notGM: Only a GM can use this feature
hero.onlyCharacter: Hero Actions is only compatible with Character actors

reroll.noPoints: You need at least 1 Hero Point to Reroll.

identifier.error: The sheet has been refreshed in between the start of the drag action and the drop, the action is therefor being canceled.
